## Source: ossf-package-analysis (881ef5215aabb6e0d9dbaf7bbbdc6f804c031cb613c83b6fdb86f0efbc99d520)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'node-scoped-http-client' @ 2.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
